channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2024030482
item.description:
Report X-2024030482

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package came down the APA chute A316. Upon inspection, i discovered that the cap was off the content bottle. This caused the internal leakage to the package. DescribePack: The content cap was off the content bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: i placed the cap back on the content bottle and placed package in a plastic bag. The package had the isopropyl alcohol, so no absorbent material was used.

item.title: Report X-2024030488
item.description:
Report X-2024030488

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was on the IC roller by door A316. The content cap was loosened, causing internal leakage and package damage. DescribePack: The content cap was loosened causing content to erode a small hole in the top corner of the package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic bag and content cap was secured to prevent further leakage.

item.title: Report X-2024030356
item.description:
Report X-2024030356

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-27
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was on Unload Bank1, under the IC rollers by door 13. Two content caps were loose, causing internal leakage. DescribePack: Contents caps were loose.. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a plastic and oil dry was used to absorb the spill.

item.title: Report X-2024030152
item.description:
Report X-2024030152

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE HANDLER WAS UNLOADING TRUCK WHEN NOTICED THE BOX SMELED OF TOLUENE AND IT WAS WET. ONCE GOT TO QA WAS THEN THE PIN SIZED PUNCTURE AT THE HANDLE CONNECTION. DescribePack: THERE IS A IN SIZED WHOLE AT THE HANDLE. DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: THE BOX WAS IMMEDIATELY BAGGED AND BROUGHT TO QA
